_header: Now will ye lords wash or shall I wash
_description: Charles d’Orléans, Lovers’ Desires — fourteen stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar682.First Lines: Now will ye lordis wesshe or shall y wessheIf so to doon hit be to yowre plesere…
BLHar682.Last Lines: …fforwhi my Iewbile then is to yow doonAnd so my newe fortune wol folow soon
